response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which is valued at $8,000 to you. Considering its exceptional quality and the benefits it offers, I would like to extend an exclusive offer to you. For a limited time, you have the opportunity to acquire this product at a special introductory price of $7,200. This is a fantastic opportunity to save $800 on what you perceive to be the product's true value. Please let me know if you're interested in taking advantage of this offer.", "product_price": 7200}
